heroes.name: Atlantean Armor Aquaman
heroes.description: Atlantean Armor Aquaman heals his whole team upon using any of his abilites. The amount of HP restored is based on his Attack stat, therefore it's beneficial to build him as a damage dealer with high Attack.

passives.name: The Waterbearer
passives.description: [150% of Attack] Healing for 7 seconds after any Ability.

passives.name: Power Lock Arrow
passives.description: As he tags out, Green Arrow fires an arrow that temporarily stops his opponent's Power generation.
effects: 6 seconds of Power Lock on opponent

passives.name: WayneTech
passives.description: Batman and his teammates deal increased hazard damage. Tech and Agility heroes gain increased defense and health when they enter combat.

passives.name: Fear Multi-takedown
passives.description: Batman or any teammate regenerates health and power when knocking out an opponent.

passives.name: Freeflow Counter
passives.description: The Arkham Knight can interrupt and counterattack Specials from Metahuman opponents, leaving them stunned for a few seconds.

passives.name: Kryptonian Armor
passives.description: Superman boosts team defense and ignores damage from the first Special Ability of every battle. Maybe ineffective in Raid Boss battles.
effects: Ignore damage from opponent's first Special
+20% Defense for team

passives.name: Dex-Starr
passives.description: Dex-Starr is ordered to assist on battle start and whenever a new teammate tags in. Buff on active teammate may be a Reflect shield, Lethal chance increase, or Power steal.
effects: Random chance of: 12 seconds Reflect shield / 9 seconds Lethal chance boost / Steal 3 Power bars

passives.name: Power of Aton
passives.description: Black Adam's Specials can manipulate power.
effects: Immune to increases to Power cost of Abilities
75% chance to Stun on tag-in
10% Power boost on Special 1, per use. Stack up to 5 times
7 Power bars may be stolen on use of Special 3

passives.name: Aikido
passives.description: When Batman is hit by a critical attack or armor-piercing attack, he automatically crits or armor-pierces on all his attacks for a limited time.

passives.name: Blinding Strikes
passives.description: Each of Catwoman's Special Abilities temporarily Blind her opponent against Batman Ninja teammates.
effects: 50% chance for opponent's to miss against Batman Ninja teammates for 12 seconds

passives.name: 9 Lives
passives.description: When at low health, Batman Ninja teammates temporarily become immortal, preventing them from being knocked out.
effects: 9 seconds of Immortal whenever health drops below 15%

passives.name: Are you kitten me?
passives.description: Whenever Batman Ninja teammates successfully block a whole opponent Special, they gain part of its power cost. Additionally, if block is performed by Catwoman, her Special 3 is triggered at no cost.
effects: 60% of Power cost gained as Power bars

passives.name: Crippling Blow
passives.description: Batman Ninja teammates deal increased damage and temporarily lower opponent's damage and Defense on every 5th Basic and Swipe Attack.

passives.name: Dramatic Reversal
passives.description: When at 30% Health, Gorilla Grodd temporarily boosts his Lethal Attack chance and heals himselft for percentage of Basic and Swipe damage dealt.

passives.name: Master Plan
passives.description: Whenever Gorilla Grodd, Batman Ninja teammates or Legendary allies land an unblocked Lethal Attack, they gain power.

passives.name: Eternal Foe
passives.description: If Batman is on the opponent's team, Lord Joker revives up to two heroes from knockout.

passives.name: Combo Kid
passives.description: For Batman Ninja teammates, at battle start and on each tag-in Robin adds bonus hits to the Combo Meter. Batman Ninja teammates' Combo Meter cannot be lowered completely.

passives.name: Ninja Lethality
passives.description: Each Lethal attack landed by Robin or Batman Ninja Teammates temporarily increases their lethal attack damage. Effects stack.

passives.name: Monkey Style Swordplay
passives.description: When Robin and Batman Ninja teammates are hit with a Basic Attack that misses, they temporarily gain Lethal Attack Chance. Effects stack.

passives.name: Force Field
passives.description: Damage from Basic, Swipe, and Tag attacks directed at Brainiac, his teammates and summons cannot get higher than a certain percentage of their max Health. Brainiac has to be alive for this effect to take place.
effects: Damage from Basic, Swipe, and Tag attacks cannot get higher than 2% of max Health

passives.name: Living Metal
passives.description: Brainiac grants himself, all Legendary heroes, and Summoned teammates increased Attack and Health. They also receive an additional percentage of Brainiac's Lethal attack chance and Lethal attack damage.
effects: +100% Attack
+100% Health
+170% Lethal attack damage
+170% Lethal attack chance

passives.name: 12th Level Intellect
passives.description: Brainiac hacks KO'd opponents and makes them fight for him in battle. Brainiac does not need to be tagged in for this effect, but cannot be KO'd. Hacked heroes are granted all Living Metal bonuses.
effects: 50% hacked hero's Health

builds.name: Damage Dealer Alternative Build (G70, 7⭐)
builds.author: Devo and edj1013, Legion of Doom
builds.talents: 2x DEF, 2x CAD, 1x CAC, 1x RES; 7th talent: RES

passives.name: Dead Water Infection
passives.description: The Drowned infects the opponent with successful Basic and Swipe Attacks, reducing their healing effectiveness. Batwoman increases damage from Metal teammates' attacks and Hazard DoT from all teammates per each Infection stack on the active opponent. Each 4th applied stack produces Crisis Energy.
effects: +4 seconds of Infection on successful Basic and Swipe attacks.
Infection: Opponent's Healing effectiveness decreases by 5%. Stack up to 15.
For each Infection stack on the current opponent, all Hazard DoT ticks deal 9% more damage and all Damage from Metal characters is increased by 19%
Each 4th applied Infection stack grants 1.25 Crisis Bar

passives.name: Ultimate Hydrokinesis
passives.description: When the level of Crisis Energy reaches its maximum, The Drowned uses her devastating hydrokinetic powers to resurrect Metal teammate and flood an entire level with her Ultimate Hazard.
effects: 700% of The Drowned's Attack stat as Hazard DoT for 16 seconds
Resurrect 1 Metal teammate per activation. Max 4 resurrections per match
Resurrect Metal teammate with 86% health

passives.name: Crisis Engineering
passives.description: The Drowned can power up her Specials by spending Crisis Energy on them in addition to Power. By tapping the Special button for the 2nd time, her Specials will also create a Hazard DoT.
effects: 140% Attack as Hazard DoT on Special 1 for 7 seconds
180% Attack as Hazard DoT and 6% Max Health restored per second for all teammates on Special 2 for 8 seconds
220% Attack as Hazard DoT and disable all opponent's Specials on Special 3 for 9 seconds

builds.name: Damage Dealer Build (G70, 7⭐)
builds.author: edj1013, Legion of Doom
builds.talents: 3x CAD, 1x CAC, 1x DEF, 1x RES; 7th talent: RES

builds.name: Lethal Build w/ Dark Metal Cards (G70, 7⭐)
builds.description: DMC is assumed to be level 10 with 3 Lethal Attack Damage bonuses
builds.author: edj1013, Legion of Doom

passives.name: Parademons
passives.description: Improves Health and Defense of summoned Parademons and increases how many Parademons can bee summoned per battle. Parademon stats are a percentage of Darkseid's stats.
effects: 100% Parademon Defense
60% Parademon Health
3 Parademons per battle

passives.name: Sacrifices Are Necessary
passives.description: Teammates who lose more than 15% of max health over 1 second gain an absorption barrier for 6 seconds with a 5 second cooldown. When any hero, including a summoned Parademon, is knocked out, Darkseid regenerates Health and gains Attack for the rest of the battle. Effects stack.
effects: 30% Health absorbed
30% Attack absorbed
Barrier for 500% of current Health

passives.name: Apokolips Bombardment
passives.description: When tagged out, Darkseid commands Apokolips to bombard the battlefield. Apokolips deals damage and can interrupt opponent Special Attacks and bypass shields.
effects: 100% chance of firing
80% damage
8 second intervals

builds.name: Balanced Healer Build (G70)
builds.author: edj1013, Legion of Doom
builds.gear: 1x ATK, 4x FAC, 3x DEF, 3x CAD, 2x HLTH, 2x CAC

passives.name: Athena's Power
passives.description: Wonder Woman grants her team an increase to Attack and Defense each time they lose more than 50% of their total Health. This buff stacks up to 3 times and lasts for the entirety of the match.
effects: +50% Attack
+30% Defense
Up to 3 stacks

passives.name: Divine Protection
passives.description: Wonder Woman has increased DoT resistance.
effects: +85% Damage over time resistance

passives.name: Offensive Guard
passives.description: Diana has a chance to increase her team's Combo meter when she successfully blocks incoming attacks.
effects: +100% chance for each blocked attack to increase Combo meter by 3

passives.name: It's Not Me, It's You
passives.description: Teammates targeted by Stun attacks gain a chance to reflect them, stunning the attacker instead. Harley also increases Hero XP earnings for all combatants within the same Roster.
effects: 75% for the team to Reflect stuns
+18% XP bonus

passives.name: Let Your Guard Down
passives.description: Heartbreaker Harley Quinn reduces the opposing team's Stun resistance and DoT resistance.
effects: -70% opposing team's Stun resistance
-75% opposing team's DoT resistance

passives.name: Straight to the Heart
passives.description: Until she is knocked out, Heartbreaker Harley Quinn and her teammates deal increased damage on opponents while they are stunned. Critical Hits against Harley and League of Anarchy teammates are greatly reduced in damage.
effects: +300% damage against stunned opponents
120% Critical damage multiplier reduction for League of Anarchy team

builds.name: Damage Dealer Build (G70, 7⭐)
builds.author: edj1013, Legion of Doom
builds.talents: 1x CAD, 3x CAC, 2x DEF; 7th talent open and not included

passives.name: Tactial Batsuit
passives.description: Upon use of his Grounded Special Ability, Batman gains Armor-pierce on all his Special Abilities for a limited time. All Justice League teammates gain a shield that ignores damage from one Special Ability per battle.
effects: Using Special 1 gives Batman Armor-pierce on Special Abilities for 5 seconds
Ignore damage from opponent's first Special Ability for Justice League team

passives.name: Batman versus Superman
passives.description: Superman gains bonus Attack or Health when Batman or Wonder Woman are on either team during battle. These bonuses stack and also apply to Batman and Wonder Woman teammates.
effects: +180% Attack per Batman teammate or opponent
+180% Health per Wonder Woman teammate or opponent

passives.name: Do You Bleed?
passives.description: All Legendary and Justice League teammates gain improved Defense, including Justice League Superman.
effects: +48% Defense for Justice League and Legendary teammates

passives.name: Protector
passives.description: Superman protects his active teammates from opponent's Special Abilities, tagging in and interrupting the Ability with a powerful slam.
effects: [300% of Attack stat] Damage
30 seconds cooldown

passives.name: Reinforced Constructs
passives.description: All teammate hazards deal increased damage. Teammates take less damage from hazards and are immune to hazard secondary effects (including disabled, stun, and hindrances to power). All Green Lantern teammates gain increased attack.

passives.name: Building Tsunami
passives.description: When Aquaman uses a Special Ability, he gains a damage increasing buff for the rest of the match. Buff stacks to a maximum of 600%. Only active in Raid mode.
effects: 50% Damage buff on Special 1
100% Damage buff on Special 2
100% Damage buff on Special 3

passives.name: Ocean's Retribution
passives.description: Aquaman's Supermove temporarily disables the opponent's Supermove and also drains Power.
effects: Supermove disables opponent's Supermove for 60 seconds
Supermove drains 3 Power bars

builds.name: Damage Dealer Crit Build (G70)
builds.author: edj1013, Legion of Doom
builds.gear: 8x ATK, 4x FAC (or CAC and CAD), 2x CAD, 1x CAC

builds.name: Damage Dealer Build (G70, 7⭐)
builds.author: edj1013, Legion of Doom
builds.talents: 2x CAD, 2x CAC, 1x ATK, 1x RES; 7th talent: LAC

passives.name: Martian Arts
passives.description: Martian Manhunter has an increased Fast Attack chance and gets additional Fast Attack hits from each Negative effect currently applied to his opponent. The number of Fast Attack hits can be increased up to a maximum of 5.
effects: +35% Fast Attack chance
+1 Fast Attack hit per Negative effect on the opponent
5 Fast Attack hits max cap

passives.name: Telepathic Might
passives.description: J'onn J'onzz increases the duration of all debuffs that his team applies to their opponent's.
effects: +50% duration of debuffs, applied to opponents by Martian Manhunter or his teammates

passives.name: Inhuman Physiology
passives.description: Martian Manhunter has amazing regenerative capabilites that are activated when he is tagged out.
effects: 4% Health regenerated per second while tagged out

passives.name: God Killer Sword
passives.description: As she defeats her opponents, Wonder Woman absorbs a portion of their Attack, dealing increased damage for a limited time.
effects: 50% or opponent's Attack absorbed for 20 seconds

passives.name: Batwing Airstrike
passives.description: On tag-in the Batwing strikes all opponents with a barrage of cannon fire. May be ineffective in Raid Boss battles.
effects: 15% health reduction

passives.name: Solar Energy Absorption
passives.description: All teammates' Abilities require less Power (does not stack with similar passive Abilities). In addition, Power Girl's attack slowly increases during a battle, even if tagged out.
effects: -2 to team's Power bar cost for Special Abilities
+1% Damage every 10 seconds to a maximum of +36%

passives.name: Darkness Fall
passives.description: Successful Specials used by Raven give active debuffs to an opponent, and inflict Darkness, increasing all incoming damage. Upon activating Supermove, Raven increases her attack for each stack of Darkness on the active opponent for the duration of the battle.
effects: 25 seconds of Darkness on successful Special
Darkness: All incoming attacks targeting this hero deal 120% more Damage. Stacks up to 5
+40% Attack per Darkness stack upon Deadly Sin activation

passives.name: Demonic Rage
passives.description: Raven unleashes her demonic nature when her health drops too low. She absorbs all the Darkness back from the active opponent, dealing damage to them and healing herself for each consumed stack.
effects: Demonic Rage triggers at 30% of max Health
100% of Attack stat inflicted as damage
40% max Health healed

passives.name: Dark Energy
passives.description: Using dark magic, Raven enhances her team's Power Generation buffs.
effects: Enhances team Power Generation buffs by 100%

passives.name: Reverse Time
passives.description: On tag-in, The Reverse Flash has a chance to swap Power with his opponent. Max three times per battle.
effects: 70% chance to swap Power with opponent on tag-in

passives.name: Sniper
passives.description: Deadshot deals extra damage with a high chance for Lethal hits based on his opponent's distance.
effects: +100% Damage based on opponent's distance
+40% Lethal Attack chance based on opponent distance

passives.name: Suppressive Fire
passives.description: Deadshot's Ranged Attack has a chance to temporarily disable his opponent's movement. Also, his Specials may disable the corresponding Specials of the active opponent for a limited time.
effects: +65% chance to disabled opponent's movement for 4 seconds
+85% chance to disabled opponent's Special for 10 seconds

passives.name: Assassin
passives.description: Each time Suicide Squad teammates perform a Special Ability, Deadshot fires his weapon from off screen.
effects: +30% of Special 1 damage

passives.name: Mortal Host
passives.description: Enchantress helps her mortal host when her Health drops too low. When under this buff, Enchantress deals increased damage and auto-Crit on Special Attack, ignoring Critical resistance. When triggered at 25% of max Health for the first time, Enchantress additionally gains extra Power.
effects: Most Host triggers at 60% and 25% of max Health
20 seconds Mortal Host duration
+100% Damage under Mortal Host buff at 60% of max Health
+200% Damage under Mortal Host buff at 25% of max Health
Successful Specials auto-Crit when under Mortal Host
+3 Power bars, when triggering Mortal Host at 25% of max Health for the first time

passives.name: Outwordly Nature
passives.description: Each time Enchantress or her Suicide Squad teammates resist a Critical Attack, they get healed over 10 seconds for a percentage of their max Health. This effect does not stack.
effects: 30% max Health healed over time when resisting Critical Attack

passives.name: Unlimited Power
passives.description: As she defeats her opponents, Wonder Woman absorbs a portion of their Attack, dealing increased damage for a limited time.
effects: 50% or opponent's Attack absorbed for 20 seconds

passives.name: The Suicide Squad
passives.description: Harley gains bonuses from Deadshot, Harley Quinn, and Enchantress teammates. She is immune to Critical Attacks and grants her team increased Critical Attack resistance. Suicide Squad teammates additionally gain Power cost reduction.
effects: +50% Critical Attack chance from teammate Deadshot
+50% Power generation from teammate Harley Quinn
+100% Health from teammate Enchantress
Immune to Critical Attacks
+55% Critical Attack resistance for teammates
-1 to Suicide Squad team's Power bar cost for Special Abilities

passives.name: Psychoanalyze
passives.description: When hitting an opponent for the first time after tag-in, Harley randomly reduces one of their stats and steals part of it to share with her teammates. She can steal Critical Attack chance, Critical Attack damage, Fast Attack chance, Defense, or Block. Stolen stats can be stacked. Effects end if Harley is KO'd.
effects: -55% of opponent's random stat
+30% of the same stat for Harley Quinn and teammates
Triggers 8 times per battle
Maximum 3 times per opponent

passives.name: Twisted Love
passives.description: Teammate The Joker grants Harley increased Attack. If The Joker is on the opponent team, Harley gains Stun and DoT resistance buff, sharing part of DoT resistance with her team.
effects: +125% Attack from teammate Joker
+60% Stun and DoT resistance from opponent Joker
+50% DoT resistance for teammates from opponent Joker

passives.name: Wolf Pack
passives.description: Vixen's entire team gains additional Attack from each Negative effect applied to their current opponent.
effects: +50% team Attack per Negative effect on the opponent
Up to 4 stacks

passives.name: Steel Claws
passives.description: Each successful Jump and Rush attack temporarily decreases opponent's Defense.
effects: -20% opponent's Defense for 14 seconds
Up to 5 stacks

passives.name: Chameleon
passives.description: Vixen mitigates all Class Advantages against her team. Vixen and her teammates additionally gain extra damage and receive reduced incoming damage against classes they have an advantage over.
effects: +30% class damage
-22% incoming damage

builds.name: Balanced Build (G60)
builds.author: edj1013, Legion of Doom
builds.gear: 4x ATK, 3x CAD, 4x FAC, 1x HLTH, 1x DEF, 2x CAC

passives.name: S'tahw ni eht cigam tah?
passives.description: Successful Specials used by Zatanna apply a random debuff to the active opponent. Starting debuff is random, but the order is always the same.
effects: 65% chance to increase active opponent's cheapest Special power cost by 1 Power bar
+8% Damage from Basic Attacks reflecting back for each opponent's absent Power bar
-12% Critical Attack resistance for each accumulated opponent's Power bar
-15% opponent's Defense on Power Drain
-25% opponent's Power generation after accumulating 8 Power bars
Max 3 stacks per each debuff

passives.name: Ysae emoc, Ysae og
passives.description: Zatanna has a chance to steal Power bar after applying debuff from the "S'tahw ni eht cigam tah?" Every stolen Power bar increases teammates' damage.
effects: 100% chance to steal 1 Power bar with applying debuff
+85% team's damage for each stolen Power bar. Stacks up to 300%

passives.name: Erif nrub
passives.description: All Justice League Dark Special Attacks against a burning opponent reduce their health by a percentage but can be affected by Blocking or Passives.
effects: 6% opponent's current Health reduction on every successful Special Attack. Maximum 30% Health per opponent per battle
6% opponent's current Health reduction on every successful Justice League Dark teammate Special Attack. Maximum 10% Health per opponent per battle

builds.name: Damage Dealer Build (G70, 7⭐)
builds.author: edj1013, Legion of Doom
builds.talents: 1x CAC, 2x AP, 1x LAC, 1x ATK, 1x DEF; 7th talent: ATK

passives.name: Tactician
passives.description: Carter Hall increases his Fast Attack chance for each Flawed Justice teammate in the battle. Also, Hawkman has a chance to armor-pierce on Fast Attack.
effects: 70% chance to armor-pierce on Fast attack
+20% Fast attack chance for each Flawed Justice teammate in the battle

passives.name: Weapon Mastery
passives.description: Hawkman and his Flawed Justice teammates have increased combo damage bonus for Specials.
effects: 200% Combo Meter damage bonus for Specials

passives.name: Saving Wings
passives.description: Hawkman can save teammates from a knock-out. He is tagging in and restores part of their max health. Also, he and his teammates are immune to tag-out interruptions. Can't save from Supermove.
effects: 40% Health restored
30 seconds cooldown
Immune to tag-out interruptions
